title: Complete Deck Transformation in Teaneck
challenge: The homeowners had a 20-year-old deck that was showing severe signs of wear, with rotting boards, unstable railings, and faded stain. The structure was unsafe for their family gatherings and needed complete reconstruction.
solution: We demolished the existing deck and rebuilt it from the ground up using premium pressure-treated lumber and composite decking materials. Added modern cable railings for unobstructed views, integrated LED lighting, and created a two-level design to maximize the sloped yard.
results: Created 600 sq ft of safe, beautiful outdoor living space
Zero maintenance composite decking with 25-year warranty
Integrated lighting extends usability into evening hours

title: Basement Finishing in Hackensack
challenge: An unfinished basement with moisture issues, poor lighting, and wasted space. The homeowners wanted to create a functional family room and home office without breaking the bank.
solution: Installed proper waterproofing and drainage system first. Added insulation, drywall, and recessed lighting throughout. Created distinct zones for entertainment and work with custom built-in shelving. Used moisture-resistant materials and added a bathroom rough-in for future expansion.
results: Added 800 sq ft of finished living space
Solved moisture problems with comprehensive waterproofing
Created dedicated home office saving $500/month in co-working fees

testimonial.text: We hired Dependable for a variety of projects including tile work, wood floor repair, and drywall patching. They delivered high-quality work at a reasonable price and even included finishing touches that weren't in the contract.

title: Patio Door Replacement in Fort Lee
challenge: Old sliding patio door was drafty, difficult to operate, and had broken seals causing condensation between panes. Energy bills were high and the door was a security concern.
solution: Removed the old door and installed a premium Andersen 400 Series sliding patio door with Low-E glass and argon fill. Properly insulated and sealed the opening, added new trim work, and ensured perfect operation.
results: Reduced heating costs by 15% in first winter
Improved home security with multi-point locking system
Enhanced curb appeal with modern design
